类 cn.sharesdk.framework.Service
的使用

  • 使用Service的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    cn.sharesdk.framework  

    • cn.sharesdk.framework中Service的使用

      类型参数类型为Service的cn.sharesdk.framework中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static <T extends Service> 
      T      		 ShareSDK.getService(java.lang.Class<T> name)
      get a registered service instance by its name
      类型变量类型为Service的cn.sharesdk.framework中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void ShareSDK.registerService(java.lang.Class<? extends Service> service)
      register ShareSDK service.
      static void ShareSDK.unregisterService(java.lang.Class<? extends Service> service)
      unregister ShareSDK service you don't have to call this method to unregister the service, after you calling ShareSDK.stopSDK(), all service will be unregistered
      this method must be called between ShareSDK.initSDK(Context) and ShareSDK.stopSDK()
      参数类型为Service的cn.sharesdk.framework中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Service.ServiceEvent(Service service)
